items.sentence: When Tom walked into the room, everybody switched to French.
Let's wait until Tom gets here before we unwrap the package.
It won't be long before Tom realizes that he made a mistake.
I'll have to resign myself to being alone while you're away.
I'll treat you like an adult when you start acting like one.
Don't forget to tell Mary that she has to do that this week.
I'd be terribly disappointed if you didn't come to my party.
We would've enjoyed our trip if it hadn't been for the rain.
Tom saw a pretty girl in the park and wanted to talk to her.
My yearly salary has been the same for the past three years.
Tom wasn't dressed as a vampire. He was dressed as a pirate.
I don't think that Tom knows what Mary's favorite flower is.
I don't think that Tom knows what Mary is making for dinner.
What happened is very different from what Tom said happened.
Tom rolled up his pants and waded ankle-deep into the water.
Tom and Mary have been dating each other since last October.
Tom needs to take care of some things before he can go home.
The hills in this area are especially beautiful in the fall.
Do you happen to know if there is an ATM somewhere close by?
Tom kisses his wife every morning as he's leaving his house.
